channel.title: Vote script help
channel.description:
I used the runetoplistv2 program, everything went smooth except for server side. When I ::check, it always says " You have no items waiting for you".
Where do I even start to find this problem lol..

item.title: Vote script help
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

I didn’t explain how mysql works, because it is not the thing he requires.

And verifying a vote is built-in, so that’s also not really required.

Regards

Read full topic

item.title: Vote script help
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Coldmedicine, post:3, topic:540852”]Pure, do you even try giving good advice?

Try commands.java, you haven’t editted the cases in there,

make it so it will give you a reward, the additem method inside a case
example:

Case 1:
REWARD METHOD
break;[/quote]Thanks for explaining to him how MySQL works and how he can verify a vote!
Apparently I don’t give good advice and I apologise, I try my best!!

Read full topic

make it so it will give you a reward, the additem method inside a case
